document.full_text: a. j. burnett followed wins by freddy garcia and bartolo colon, and nick swisher hit a three-run homer as the yankees swept three games from the athletics.
document.title: yankees 4, athletics 2: yankees ride sparkling starters to a sweep
lines_and_colors: a. j. burnett followed wins by freddy garcia and bartolo colon, and nick swisher hit a three-run homer as the yankees swept three games from the athletics.
